condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Government and partners have capacity to scale up improved service delivery at community and facility level sanitation and hygiene especially for the most deprived communities
Government of India has National Plan for the scale up of multidrug PPTCT regimen (Revised indicator No. 1 in June 2014)
No. of states which linelist and track the cohort of HIV Positive pregnant women and their children, along a standard PPTCT cascade of indicators (New indicator No. 3 added in June 2014)

target.value: 2017:18/18 states (TN, AP, KN, MH, GJ, WB, OR, MP, RJ, JK, CH, AS, UP, BH, Manipur, Meghalaya, Nagaland, Mizoram)

actual.value: 2015:4 out of 19 states: While in 4 states, AP, KN, TN, MH, efficient tracking systems are in place, in at least 4 other states, processes for line listing and tracking of cohort is being initiated

title.narrative: No. of states which implement PPTCT Multi-drug regimen (Revised indicator No. 2 in June 2014)

target.value: 2017:18/18 states (TN, AP, KN, MH, GJ, WB, OR, MP, RJ, JK, CH, AS, UP, BH, Manipur, Meghalaya, Nagaland, Mizoram)

actual.value: 2015:19 out of 19 states (including newly formed state of Telangana) are implementing PPTCT multi-drug regimen.
